question.text: As shown in the figure, forces of $10^5 \mathrm{~N}$ each are applied in opposite directions, on the upper and lower faces of a cube of side $10 \mathrm{~cm}$, shifting the upper face parallel to itself by $0.5 \mathrm{~cm}$. If the side of another cube of the same material is, $20 \mathrm{~cm}$ then under similar conditions as above, the displacement will be:
